attributes.action: stop replacing democratically elected Members of Parliament with unelected sycophants as ministers in the government of this land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are currently SEVEN unelected government ministers who are now beholden to Gordon Brown for their continued self-enrichment.  These people are involved in the running of the country but have never put themselves up to be elected and be given a mandate, and they are unaccountable to the House of Commons and/or the people of this land.  This is a depraved situation being perpetrated by an individual who is, himself, a fraudulent occupant of the post of Prime Minister, also never having been voted for by the people being most badly affected by the crimes he is now perpetrating against those same people.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
